name: We Got Another Year - Episode 1 Patreon demo
name_original: We Got Another Year - Episode 1 Patreon demo
description:
A Demo (Alpha, more technically) version of the 1st episode of my Visual Novel project is ready! 

I recommend downloading and running it from your PC, as the web player can run quite slowly even on high-end PCs

DOWNLOADS ON MY PATREON PAGE

UPDATE

v 0.1.1 - fixed game-breaking bug on Lee's route on day 3. Added musicians' webpages in the credits sidebar.
